org.apache.flink.runtime.leaderretrieval

类 ZooKeeperLeaderRetrievalService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.leaderretrieval.ZooKeeperLeaderRetrievalService
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.cache.NodeCacheListener, LeaderRetrievalService

    public class ZooKeeperLeaderRetrievalService
extends Object
implements LeaderRetrievalService, org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.cache.NodeCacheListener
    The counterpart to the ZooKeeperLeaderElectionService. This implementation of the LeaderRetrievalService retrieves the current leader which has been elected by the ZooKeeperLeaderElectionService. The leader address as well as the current leader session ID is retrieved from ZooKeeper.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ZooKeeperLeaderRetrievalService(org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework client, String retrievalPath)
      Creates a leader retrieval service which uses ZooKeeper to retrieve the leader information.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ZooKeeperLeaderRetrievalService

        public ZooKeeperLeaderRetrievalService(org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework client,
                                       String retrievalPath)
        Creates a leader retrieval service which uses ZooKeeper to retrieve the leader information.
        参数:
        client - Client which constitutes the connection to the ZooKeeper quorum
        retrievalPath - Path of the ZooKeeper node which contains the leader information

    • 方法详细资料

      • start

        public void start(LeaderRetrievalListener listener)
           throws Exception
        从接口复制的说明: LeaderRetrievalService
        Starts the leader retrieval service with the given listener to listen for new leaders. This method can only be called once.
        指定者:
        start 在接口中 LeaderRetrievalService
        参数:
        listener - The leader retrieval listener which will be notified about new leaders.
        抛出:
        Exception

          throws Exception
        从接口复制的说明: LeaderRetrievalService
